GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I hear there's a <clr:0000>geoglyph near the
Thyphlo Ruins<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0> which are north of here,
past the Eldin Mountains.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Now that Death Mountain has stopped
erupting, one can travel there freely.

Though that's not to say crossing the
nearby mountains is an easy task.
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I heard tell of a <clr:0000>geoglyph <clr:ffff>in this area,
but it refuses to show itself.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>Not for the first time, I'm wishing I had
wings like a bird. Then I could scout it out
<clr:0000>from the sky<clr:ffff>.
Greeting00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>So, fellow traveler. <sp:5:0:0>What are you
searching for on your journey?

<sp:3:0:2:0701>My passion is finding <clr:0000>geoglyphs<clr:ffff>. They're
enormous pictures that have been drawn
on the ground.
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_01>When were they drawn, and who by,
and how? The mysteries abound!
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Please, accept this small token of
my gratitude.
Greeting01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>We meet again. <sp:5:0:0>Hello, fellow traveler.<sp:0:4:0>As ever, my hunt for <clr:0000>geoglyphs<clr:ffff> continues.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Those giant illustrations boggle the mind.<sp:5:0:0>
Who drew them? When? And perhaps
above all, how?<sp:5:1:0>
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I tried to learn more about <clr:0000>geoglyphs<clr:ffff>
by asking my associates in the Zonai
Survey Team.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>Unfortunately, all they wanted to talk
about was training in their underpants.
GoRange_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I heard an interesting rumor that there
are not one but two <clr:0000>geoglyphs<clr:ffff> in Eldin.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Angry_01>The first is supposedly on the south side
of the mountain.<sp:5:0:0> Which is to say, <clr:0000>nearby<clr:ffff>.

The other one, I'm told, is on the
northwest side of the mountain range,<sp:5:0:0>
<clr:0000>near the Thyphlo Ruins<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>Sadly, my search for the geoglyph in this
area has come up empty.

I suppose I'd have better luck if I climbed
a hill and <clr:0000>peered down from its summit<clr:ffff>.
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Was it you who defeated those monsters?<sp:5:0:0>
What a brave soul!
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad>My associates in the Zonai Survey Team
had nothing to tell me about <clr:0000>geoglyphs<clr:ffff>...
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>You drove off the monsters!<sp:5:0:0> It was all
I could do to run for my life...
Atacked00: <sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Angry_01>What do I do? Hope is lost!
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>Eldin doesn't get much precipitation,<sp:5:0:0>
so we have reason to hope that the
<clr:0000>geoglyph <clr:ffff>there is in good condition.
I'm eager to see it with my own eyes as
soon as possible.
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>If I had wings like a bird, I could probably
scout out the <clr:0000>geoglyph<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>from the sky<clr:ffff>.
GoRange_03_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Rumor has it that there are two <clr:0000>geoglyphs<clr:ffff>
in Eldin.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>One is supposedly in <clr:0000>this area<clr:ffff>, and the
other is said to be on the northwest side
of the mountains, <clr:0000>near the Thyphlo Ruins<clr:ffff>.
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_00>Were you hurt? <sp:5:0:0>By some miracle,
I was not.
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>We must tread lightly. There are bound to
be more monsters about.
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad_00>My legs are tired from running, but in
other regards, I'm all right.
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>There's said to be a <clr:0000>geoglyph near the
Thyphlo Ruins<clr:ffff>, which are north of here,
past the Eldin Mountains.
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>So, fellow traveler. <sp:5:0:0>Taking shelter from
the rain? It's quite the annoyance, I know.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>I'd heard about a <clr:0000>geoglyph <clr:ffff>in Eldin, and I
was searching for it when the rain stalled
my journey.
Eldin doesn't get much precipitation,<sp:5:0:0>
so we have reason to hope that the
geoglyph there is in good condition.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>I'm eager to see it with my own eyes as
soon as possible.
Near_RainPoint_01: I wish the rain would stop.
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>You're quite the valiant fighter!<sp:5:0:0> I was
certain I wouldn't survive that bout...
